High Roller Casino offers a fairly generous welcome bonus. This service is not limited to the classic 100% bonus for the first deposit. There are 4 bonuses available for first deposits at once:

50% bonus up to 500 CAD and 50 free spins for the second deposit;

blocks.text: As a result, new customers can collect an impressive package of welcome rewards up to 2000 CAD and an additional 200 free spins in the most popular slots.

The conditions for activating this bonus package are quite simple. To receive each of the bonuses, you need to deposit 20 CAD or more into your balance. In this case, you can activate special offers that will be valid for 30 days. Free spins must be used within 24 hours from the moment they are credited.

Weekly Wheel Drops

Every week you can take part in Weekly Wheel Drops. This is a special promotion on the High Roller Casino website from the Pragmatic Play studio. Players can win a share of the total prize pool, which is 560,000 CAD.
During the games, you need to collect 3 wheel pieces to take part in this draw. There is no minimum bet and there is no wagering requirement on the prizes.
Daily Tournaments

The prize pool in daily tournaments is 32,000 CAD. The minimum bet to participate in tournaments is only 0.30 CAD. You earn points and can win real money prizes. The points are equal to the total win multiplier from your first 5,000 spins.
Be sure to check out the list of participating games. Play for real money, participate in tournaments and get the big wins you deserve.
Level Up Rewards
At High Roller Casino, every spin counts. Therefore, active players can play regularly, spin, level up and get special rewards for it.

The terms of the promotion are as simple and transparent as possible. You play for real money, place bets in slots and other games. At the same time, you can watch how the bar around the club in the left menu begins to fill up. As soon as the bar is completely filled, this means moving to a new level.
As soon as your level increases, you receive a special reward in the form of free spins. This provides a completely personalized reward system.

Free spins for leveling up have a wager of x30. To wager free spins, you will have 24 hours from the moment they are credited. Free spins do not participate in the progress. It is also important to note that you will not receive progress for games with live dealers either.
VIP Program
